content.paragraph: When you first join an Online Group, complete the following steps:

numberedlist.listitem:
Visit your profile page and:
click the Edit Profile link in the menu on the left to set your local timezone and create a bio for yourself
click the Edit Email Settings link in the menu on the left to make sure your email address(es) are specified correctly
click the Set Password link in the menu on the left to create a new password to secure your access to this website. Record your password in a secure but accessible place.
Create a bookmark (favourite) for this site in your Web browser so that you can easily find your way back here
Visit your Online Group's home page. Make sure you are famliar with the Purpose, Membership and Participation Protocol as they define what the Online Group is for and what is appropriate there.
Add the Online Group's email address to your email address book (use this to send emails to the group)

bulletlist.listitem: read the Basic Participation section in this User Guide
read the Effective Participation section in this User Guide
experiment in your Online Group — make a post just to say hello and see who replies. If you have any comments or questions, post them to the Online Group.
